Solicitud de Ingreso para Escuela de la Biblia Berea
¿Está interesado en aprender más acerca de Global University? Haga clic a continuación para enviarnos su información y un representante se comunicará enseguida.

La Facultad de Estudios de Postgrado de Teología, en español, existe para preparar a los alumnos a vivir y ministrar en varias culturas a través de investigación individual, aplicación académica personal, y concientización cultural. La facultad provee estudio especializado y avanzado de la Biblia y materias relacionadas a un nivel post universitario de licenciatura.

La Facultad de Estudios de Pregrado de Biblia y Teología ofrece programas de estudio diseñados para ministros, estudiantes ministeriales y obreros laicos que desean estudios profundos en el área de educación bíblica a nivel universitario.
LA ESCUELA DE LA BIBLIA BEREA

La Escuela de la Biblia Berea es un programa educativo de educación continua que existe para ayudar a los creyentes a responder al llamado de Dios en sus vidas. La escuela provee una preparación de alta calidad a bajo costo para el liderazgo de las iglesias, laicos y para el enriquecimiento de conocimiento personal de los creyentes–todo dentro del contexto de la iglesia y la comunidad local. La Escuela de la Biblia Berea esta integrada a Global University para facilitar un aprendizaje para toda la vida.

El propósito de la Escuela de Evangelismo y Discipulado de Global University es alcanzar a los perdidos utilizando todo medio posible. Los materiales de evangelismo varían desde historietas ilustradas y currículo infantil hasta libros para estudiantes universitarios. Utilizados en más de 175 países y en más de 120 idiomas, estos materiales de Vida Cristiana son ideales para estudio en grupo o individual.

Have questions about Library resources? Contact me via email.

The mission of the Global University Library is to support teaching, research, and intellectual inquiry at Global University by providing diverse scholarly resources and innovative services to the students, faculty, staff, and alumni of the university.

Get to know our collections and services by taking a tour of this Library website. The Library has a variety of electronic collections for our distance students as well as print collections for our in-house faculty and staff.

Connect to specialized search options and course research guides. Undergraduate and graduate students, as well as resident and adjunct faculty, may access subscription resources with proper login credentials.
When you try to open a link to a restricted resource, the Global University proxy server login screen will appear. Log in with your student or faculty ID and password.
After logging in to the proxy server you will be able to access that resource as well as other licensed resources.

. Licensed resources--such as CREDO Reference and EBSCO Journal Databases--are available only to GU Undergraduate & Graduate students and faculty members with proper login credentials. Licensed resources are not available to Berean School of the Bible (BSB) students.

Not sure where to start? Ask us! Get assistance in person, by email, live chat, or phone. Chat and phone assistance are available only during regular Global University business hours and when a librarian is present.

Are you interested in learning more about Global University? Click below to send us your information and a representative will contact you shortly.

The Graduate School of Theology exists to equip students to live and minister in multiple cultures through individual research, personal scholarship, and cultural awareness. It does so by providing advanced, in-depth, specialized study of the Bible and related subjects at the post-bachelor's degree level.

The Undergraduate School of Bible and Theology offers programs designed for ministers, ministerial students, and laypersons who desire in-depth study in the area of biblical education at a college degree level.

Berean School of the Bible is an adult continuing education program that exists to help believers fulfill God's call on their lives by providing high quality, affordable preparation for church leadership, lay ministry, and personal enrichment within the context of the local church and community. Berean School of the Bible is integral to Global University's facilitation of life-long learning for all believers.

The purpose of the School for Evangelism and Discipleship (SED) is to impact lives for eternity. This is the sole reason SED exists. With complete dependence on the Holy Spirit, SED will impact lives of every tribe and tongue through evangelism and discipleship training programs. Currently, SED materials are available worldwide in over 130 languages via 200 offices where untold millions have been impacted for eternity.

Global University is both an educational and a missions driven institution. We go to areas where there is no adequate Bible training for pastors so the lost can learn the truth of God. The university depends on God and on the faithful support of donors to carry on with missions projects around the world.
Policy Updates - Study Group Material and Shipping
Revisions have been made to our policies regarding the refund of study group material as well as changes to our shipping procedure.
Global U Announces 3 Year Tuition Lock
Global is continuing its commitment to its students by locking in tuition rates for the next three years starting January 1, 2019, and continuing through December 31, 2021.
